verbose_text: We designed two sgRNAs targeting the CpG island located in the Cdkn1a promoter (XREF_FIG A) and cloned them into lentiviral vectors (in which sgRNAs and GFP are expressed constitutively from two different promoters) and transduced 32D cells (mouse IL3 dependent myeloid progenitor cell line with an unmethylated Cdkn1a promoter and active Cdkn1a expression).
